name: My sandbox (AloGames)
description:
This is a 2d sandbox game were you can create your own 2d world.

Object that you can create for the simulation ;

- Sand.

- TNT.

- Mega TNT.

How to play :

left click to create block.

right click to delete block.

use arrows to move camera.

press "a" to activate simulation and press again "a" to stop simulation.

press "z" to save your world.

press "e" to load your world.

press "r" to open your inventory.
